title: 2.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
What would be the type of the number which is obtained by dividing two integers? Will it always be an integer?
Write a program that divides the number 5 by number 3 and displays the data type of the result. Provide the algorithm and the flowchart for your approach.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
